text: Hey Everyone! Can you believe 2020 is right around the corner? I’m working on a blog article discussing goals web developers have for the new year. If you are a developer or a leader of a team of developers and don’t mind sharing and being mentioned in my article please leave a comment in a thread with your goal, why this is your goal, name, and company. Thanks!
Where can we read these blog ?
there is nothing written yet.. just crowd sourcing for it right now.. it will be posted on <http://impactbnd.com|impactbnd.com> once written if i get anything
<@U7SL518D6> Shamelessly stealing your response. Deploying it for every future eye-rolling request.

Random fact I learned today: in medieval times people that used to travel from jousting tournament to tournament to compete for money they were called free-lancers. 

Free as in not bound to anywhere and lancers because well lances. 

So there you go, the origin of the word freelancer.
